text: - [iA Writer]({{$url0}}): A Markdown syntax editor known for its simplicity, though it lacks note organization and related features.
- [Paper]({{$url0}}): A writing app with a better writing experience than iA Writer, but has some bugs and limitations, making it suitable only for simple notes.
- [Obsidian]({{$url0}}): An app primarily used for organizing content. Paired with [Vitepress]({{$url1}}) to share notes online as a static website.
- [Notion]({{$url0}}): A collaborative platform for creating and sharing content, supporting automation through its API.
- [Wooting 60HE]({{$url0}}): A keyboard used for typing while writing in text editors.
- [Spotify]({{$url0}}): Music streaming service used during writing, programming, and other activities.
- [Endel]({{$url0}}): A music app used to generate personalized soundscapes for focus and relaxation.
- [Xnapper]({{$url0}}): A tool for taking screenshots.
- [ray.so]({{$url0}}): A service for generating code snippets via Puppeteer automation macros.
- [TinyPNG]({{$url0}}): An image optimization tool used with macros to compress images.
- [Dropshare]({{$url0}}): A tool for sharing images and files.
- [DigitalOcean]({{$url0}}): A cloud hosting service used for hosting images and files.
- [Paste]({{$url0}}): A clipboard manager for easier text editing and accessing previously copied content.
- [Linear]({{$url0}}): A task management tool used to organize and manage work with API integration.
- [Todoist]({{$url0}}): Another task management tool offering API access.
- [Slack]({{$url0}}): A communication platform used for messaging and integrating with AI assistants.
- [Google Workspace]({{$url0}}): A suite of productivity tools including Gmail, used for email management and automation.
- [Superhuman]({{$url0}}): An email client used in combination with Gmail for enhanced email management.
- [make.com]({{$url0}}): An automation platform used to create workflows and automate tasks.
- [Zencal]({{$url0}}): A scheduling tool for booking meetings with pre-set time blocks.
- [Notion Calendar]({{$url0}}): A calendar app within Notion, offering intuitive keyboard shortcuts and a minimalist interface.
- [Raycast]({{$url0}}): An application used for searching and executing commands via keyboard shortcuts.
- [Arc Browser]({{$url0}}): The main web browser used for internet browsing with features like Command Bar and Little Arc.
- [Feedly]({{$url0}}): A news aggregator used for staying updated on topics of interest.
- [Product Hunt]({{$url0}}): A site used for exploring new products and updates.
- [daily.dev]({{$url0}}): A platform for staying updated with development news.
- [Indie Hackers]({{$url0}}): A community site used for networking and learning from other indie hackers.
- [HackerNews]({{$url0}}): A news site for staying updated on tech and startup news.
- [HTMLCSSToImage]({{$url0}}): A tool for automatically generating graphics based on HTML and CSS templates.
- [Figma]({{$url0}}): A design tool used for UI design and creating advertisements, utilizing components and auto-layout features.
- [Adobe Photoshop Beta]({{$url0}}): A photo editing tool used for editing images and assets, particularly with Generative AI features.
- [Webflow]({{$url0}}): A web design tool used for graphic editing and creating designs based on templates.
- [Stable Diffusion 3]({{$url0}}): A generative AI tool used for creating graphics and assets.
- [Shortcuts]({{$url0}}): An application used for creating macros and automation workflows.
- [Keyboard Maestro]({{$url0}}): A macro and automation tool for enhancing productivity on macOS.
- [Better Touch Tool]({{$url0}}): A tool for customizing trackpad gestures and enhancing productivity on macOS.
- [IntelliJ IDEA]({{$url0}}): The main code editor used, compatible with multiple programming languages like TypeScript and Rust.
- [Supermaven]({{$url0}}): An alternative to GitHub Copilot, offering intelligent code suggestions.
- [iTerm]({{$url0}}): A terminal application preferred for its simplicity and performance.
- [TablePlus]({{$url0}}): A database client for managing databases on macOS.
- [Amazon Kindle]({{$url0}}): An app used for reading e-books.
- [Audible]({{$url0}}): An audiobook platform used for listening to books.
- [PlayStation 5]({{$url0}}): A gaming console used for gaming.
- [Nvidia GeForce Now]({{$url0}}): A cloud gaming service used for streaming games from the Steam account.
- [Steam Deck]({{$url0}}): A handheld gaming device used for gaming on the go.
- [Nintendo Switch]({{$url0}}): A gaming console used for portable and home gaming.
- [GitHub Actions]({{$url0}}): A tool used for automating application deployment.
- [GPT-4]({{$url0}}): A large language model used for writing assistance, brainstorming, and programming support.
- [Claude]({{$url0}}): A large language model used for similar purposes as GPT-4.
